Text.Page:
Ugh! This stench! The gulas use some sort of spice that smells like dung-slathered zompori. They love itâ€”can't get enough.

In the interest of hurting their morale and improving mine, I want you to steal it. I'll destroy it and we can all breathe easier.

Big mistake. I should have had you destroy it out there. Yuck!

I think I just threw up a little.
Stealing their spice is the best idea. Trust me.
